name: Stepper
description: Stepper component for displaying multi-step processes and wizards.

props.name: steps
props.description: Steps with label, description, disabled, completed, content

examples.title: Basic Stepper

migrationExamples.mui:
import { Stepper, Step, StepLabel } from '@mui/material';
<Stepper activeStep={0}>
  <Step><StepLabel>Step 1</StepLabel></Step>
</Stepper>
migrationExamples.designSystem:
import { Stepper } from '@/components';
<Stepper steps={[{ label: 'Step 1' }]} activeStep={0} />
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Stepper with design system Stepper

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Not directly interactive, content is navigated normally
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Current step, total steps, and step labels are announced

whenNotToUse: For simple tab navigation (use Tabs instead)
bestPractices: Allow going back to previous steps when possible
